FulfillmentStepDependency.name: FulfillmentStepDependency
FulfillmentStepDependency.description: Represents a dependency between tasks by defining the order between a task and one that depends on it.

DependencyDefinitionId.description: The name of the fulfillment step dependency definition.

DependentStepId.description: The name of a fulfillment step that depends on this step.

DependsOnStepId.description: The name of the fulfillment step that this step depends on. That is, the name of the step that must be executed before this one can run.

Name.description: An automatically generated name for the fulfillment step dependency.
